replies.author: YueHaxgu
replies.txt_content:
/difficulty 0
在你想要调的世界输入这个

replies.author: xiangnian
replies.txt_content:
plotworld:
    ==: MVWorld
    hidden: 'false'
    alias: plotworld
    color: WHITE
    style: NORMAL
    pvp: 'true'
    scale: '1.0'
    respawnWorld: ''
    allowWeather: 'true'
    difficulty: HARD
    spawning:
      ==: MVSpawnSettings
      animals:
        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings
        spawn: 'true'
        spawnrate: '-1'
        exceptions: []
      monsters:
        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings
        spawn: 'false'
        spawnrate: '0'
        exceptions: []
    entryfee:
      ==: MVEntryFee
      amount: '0.0'
      currency: '-1'
    hunger: 'true'
    autoHeal: 'true'
    adjustSpawn: 'true'
    portalForm: ALL
    gameMode: SURVIVAL
    keepSpawnInMemory: 'true'
    spawnLocation:
      ==: MVSpawnLocation
      yaw: 0.0
      pitch: 0.0
      z: 3.5
      y: 66.0
      x: 3.5
    autoLoad: 'true'
    bedRespawn: 'true'
    worldBlacklist: []
    environment: NORMAL
    seed: '-6283892288607372580'
    generator: PlotMe
    playerLimit: '-1'
    allowFlight: 'true'

replies.author: xiangnian
replies.txt_content:
xiangnian 发表于 2015-5-3 18:45
plotworld:
    ==: MVWorld
    hidden: 'false'
吧这个代替掉mv多时间插件的world配置文件中所描述的plotworld世界的配置
